title: Thunderbird fails to import previously exported profile
content:
Thunderbird was not responding and tried to reinstall profile. There are many (needed) emails that were saved in folders that are missing from the profile.

Used the export and import functions under tools menu. Possible corruption in sav8ng the profile.

How can we get the folders back ? The server copy has inbox but not folder baes email

Tb 115.15.0 32 bit on win 10
creator: chrisrichardson1955
